tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robot_control_system_updates (
    update_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    update_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    update_description TEXT,
    release_date DATE,
    update_version VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE patches (
    patch_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    update_id INTEGER,
    patch_name VARCHAR(50),
    patch_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (update_id) REFERENCES software_updates(update_id)
);

CREATE TABLE robots (
    robot_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacture_date DATE,
    last_update_id INTEGER,
    FOREIGN KEY (last_update_id) REFERENCES software_updates(update_id)
);

CREATE TABLE robot_logs (
    log_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INTEGER,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES robots(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE update_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    update_id INT,
    system_id INT,
    update_status VARCHAR(50),
    update_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE patch_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_id INT,
    system_id INT,
    patch_status VARCHAR(50),
    patch_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
